are-you-sure-cannot-undo: Are you sure? Deleted content cannot be restored.
change-email-check: Check your new email inbox for the verification code. The code is a six-digit number, for example 123456.
change-email-conflict: This email address is already in use. Addresses must be unique to users. Choose another email address.
change-email-expiration: The code is valid for 30 minutes. If the code expires you must send a new one.
change-email-finish-info: Your account's email address is now changed. You may return back to the map.
change-email-info: To keep your account safe, we must verify that you can access the new email address. Send a verification message to your new address. Then, copy the verification code in the message to the field below and type your password to accept the change.
change-email-msg1: Here is a security code to change your account's email address on
change-email-msg3: Copy the code below and paste it to the form from which you sent the code. If you did not expect a security code, you can ignore this message.
change-email-save-error: We could not change your email. Please try another address or try again later.
change-email-save-unauth: The given password or security code is either wrong or expired. Please check and try again.
change-email-send-failed: We failed to send you email. Ensure the email address you gave is correct or try again later.
change-email-send-success: Security code sent to your email successfully.
change-email-subject: Verification code for email change at
comment-bad-length: Message is too short or long.
comment-removal-info: 'This will delete the comment and its attachments if any.'
current-password-empty: Your current password cannot be empty.
current-password-failed: We failed to change your password.
current-password-incorrect: The given current password was incorrect. Please check and try again.
error-401-desc: It is not possible for you to access this page. An admin user account is required.
error-404-desc: We cannot find the page you were looking for. Try something else.
export-intro: Choose below to download all locations in a Google Earth compatible KML file. Note that text descriptions and file attachments such as photos are not included. On desktop browser, right-click the link and choose 'Save Link As...' for the best results.
export-offline-kml-info: Great for offline situations such as travelling in remote places.
export-online-kml-info: Stay always up-to-date with this automatically updating KML. However, Internet connection is required.
forgot-password-help: Insert your account's email address and we send you a link to reset your password.
import-however-attachments: of them had attachments that were added to the existing ones.
import-intro: Choose a file from your device, and upload. Importable locations will be listed for you before they are created. Then select wanted locations from the list and finally import.
import-not-found: No batch found. It has probably expired and been removed.
import-outcome-exists: locations already exists on the map and thus were not created.
import-remaining-skipped: locations had no new attachments and were completely skipped.
import-select-locations: Select locations you want to import from the list.
import-supported-formats: Supported formats are KML and KMZ.
invite-account-exists: An account with this email address already exists. The account owner has already received an invite and created an account.
invite-email: Email address to send the invite to
invite-mail-attention: Attention! The invite is valid only for 7 days.
invite-mail-follow: Follow the link below to create your account.
invite-send-failed: Failed to send invitation. Try again later.
location-missing: Location is missing. Check URL address.
location-status-type-fail: Sorry, updating status or type failed. Try again later.
login-failed: We failed to log you in due to an unknown issue. Please try again later.
login-incorrect: Incorrect email or password. Check and try again.
login-invalid-email: Ensure the given username or email address is correct.
move-post-confirm: Move the post to the selected location?
move-post-search: Move the post to another location. Search locations and select one.
name: Name
post-removal-info: This will delete the post and all its attachments and comments if any.
pwd-reset-attention: Attention! The link below is valid only for 30 minutes.
pwd-reset-expired: The time window for your password reset has ended. You need to request password reset again from the log in page.
pwd-reset-failed: Failed to reset the password. Try again later.
pwd-reset-info: If the user was you, please press the link and follow instructions to reset your password. If the user was not you, you can ignore this message. If the message keeps repeating, please contact the site administrator.
pwd-reset-intro: A user has requested a password reset for your account
pwd-reset-invalid-email: Ensure the given email address is correct and has a format similar to john.doe@example.com or myname@example.com.
pwd-reset-mismatch: The new passwords do not match. Please check and try again.
pwd-reset-send-failed: We failed to send the password reset message to your email. Please try again later.
pwd-reset-send-success: Password reset message was sent successfully. Please check your email.
pwd-reset-subject: Password reset requested for your account at
pwd-reset-unknown-email: No user with this email exists. Please ensure that the email address is correct.
role-form-help: Only members with administrator role can change roles of others. Administrators can also delete any content, invite new members and lock member accounts.
role-form-limit: You cannot downgrade your own account.
search-placeholder-long: e.g. city, location name, or type
signup-expired: Your invitation has expired. You need someone to send you a new invitation.
signup-failed: Failed to sign you up. Try again later.
signup-info: Choose your username and password. We use your email address to send you instructions how to reset your password in case you forget it. We might contact you by your email in case of an emergency. We will never ask your username or password so beware of scams that might ask this information.
signup-invalid-username: Invalid username. Check and try again.
signup-password-mismatch: Passwords do not match. Try again.
signup-success: Your account was created successfully. You may now log in.
signup-username: Username (choose well, you cannot change this later)
signup-username-taken: The email or username is already taken. Choose another and try again or log in with the existing account.
status-cannot-lock: You cannot lock your own account.
status-deactivate-info: A member with a deactivated status is not allowed to log in and see or edit content. Only members with administrator roles can change statuses of member accounts.
updating-coords-error: Updating the coordinates failed. Ensure both coordinates to be in the decimal degree format similar to 12.345678.
